TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SelectionRangeConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

summary.span: 提供型別轉換子 (Type Converter)，將 物件與其他各種型別相互轉換。

span.span: Provides a type converter to convert objects to and from various other types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別代表單一日期範圍。The class represents a single date or a range of dates. 這個類別是此類控制，它用來代表的選取和反白顯示日期。This class is commonly associated with the control, where it represents the selected and highlighted dates. 類別是附屬類別，可讓您將與其他類型，最常字串。The class is an adjunct class to that enables you to convert to and from other types, most often strings. 如需型別轉換子的詳細資訊，請參閱基底類別，[一般化類型轉換](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/49253ae6-7657-4810-82ab-1176a6feeada)，和[How to： 實作型別轉換子](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56)。For more information about type converters, see the base class, [Generalized Type Conversion](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/49253ae6-7657-4810-82ab-1176a6feeada), and [How to: Implement a Type Converter](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56). > [!NOTE] > 您絕對不要建立。You should never create a . 請改為呼叫 類別的 方法。Instead, call the method of the class. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的範例基底類別。For more information, see the examples in the base class.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設建構函式是由編譯器所提供。 is the default constructor supplied by the compiler. 您絕對不要建立。You should never create a . 請改為呼叫 類別的 方法。Instead, call the method of the class. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的範例基底類別。For more information, see the examples in the base class.

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool CanConvertFrom (System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context, Type sourceType);

Public Overrides Function CanConvertFrom (context As ITypeDescriptorContext, sourceType As Type) As Boolean
public: override bool CanConvertFrom(System::ComponentModel::ITypeDescriptorContext ^ context, Type ^ sourceType);

span.span: A that provides a format context.
The source to be converted.

summary.span: 判斷這個轉換子是否可以透過查詢提供的型別描述項內容，將指定之來源型別的物件轉換成轉換子的原生型別。

span.span: Determines if this converter can convert an object of the specified source type to the native type of the converter by querying the supplied type descriptor context.

returns.span: 如果這個轉換子可以執行指定的轉換，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the converter can perform the specified conversion; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別特製化類型之間進行轉換和。The class is specialized to convert between the types and . 如此一來，方法會傳回`true`如果`sourceType`參數的類型是。As a result, the method returns `true` if the `sourceType` parameter is of type . 否則，會呼叫這個方法的基底實作延後。Otherwise, it defers the call to the base implementation of this method, .

para.span: 請覆寫這個方法以提供您自己的轉換需求。

span.span: Override this method to provide your own conversion requirements.

para.span: 可以使用 參數來擷取環境的其他資訊，而這個轉換子就是從這個環境叫用的。

span.span: The parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from.

para.span: 參數可能是，因此您一定要驗證的資訊。

span.span: The parameter may be , so you should always verify the information.

para.span: 此外，內容物件上的屬性也可能會傳回 。

span.span: Also, properties on the context object may also return .

The to convert.

summary.span: 使用指定的地區設定 (Locale)，將指定的值轉換成轉換子的原生型別。

span.span: Converts the specified value to the converter's native type by using the specified locale.
An that represents the converted .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法專門用來轉換表示的日期範圍的值及其表示相互轉換。The method is specialized to convert values that represent a range of dates to their representations. 以外的類型會傳遞至這個方法的基底類別實作。Types other than are passed to the base class implementation of this method.

exception.span: 的型別為 ，但無法剖析成表示日期的兩個字串。

span.span: is of type but could not be parsed into two strings representing dates.

exception.span: 的型別為可剖析成兩個字串的 ，但無法成功將其中一個或兩者轉換成 型別。

span.span: is of type that was parsed into two strings, but the conversion of one or both into the type did not succeed.

span.span: The parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from.

para.span: 此外，內容物件上的屬性也可能會傳回 。

span.span: A that provides a format context.
An that contains the new property values.

summary.span: 使用指定的型別描述項以及物件的屬性值集合，建立 物件。

span.span: Creates a object by using the specified type descriptor and set of property values for that object.

returns.span: 如果成功的話，則為新建立的 ，否則，這個方法會擲回例外狀況。

span.span: If successful, the newly created ; otherwise, this method throws an exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法來建立它的修改的版本，不可變的現有物件進行變更。Use the method to make changes to an existing immutable object by creating a modified version of it. 此方法預期`propertyValues`參數，以有索引鍵值的項目`Start`和`End`，每個都有對應值。This method expects the `propertyValues` parameter to have elements with key values of `Start` and `End`, each with the corresponding value.

exception.span: 為 或者其 Start 和 End 項目無法轉換成 。

span.span: is or its Start and End elements could not be converted into a .

summary.span: 判斷在執行個體上變更值是否需要呼叫 來建立新的值。

span.span: Determines if changing a value on an instance should require a call to to create a new value.

returns.span: 如果必須呼叫 方法才能對一或多個屬性進行變更，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if must be called to make a change to one or more properties; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設的實作 (Implementation) 一定會傳回 `true`。The default implementation always returns `true`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法的預設實作不會使用`context`或`value`參數，但指的是 TypeDescriptor 的呼叫。The default implementation of this method does not use the `context` or `value` parameters, but simply refers the call to the TypeDescriptor. 方法。method.
